about_the_game:
Backrooms: The Next Level is a cooperative horror game for up to 4 players where you and your friends will explore a spooky environment using your memory and wits to complete the game.

  • High complexity

    There are no tutorials in the game, it is not suitable for beginners!

  • Co-op
    Supports up to 4 players simultaneously.

  • Stealth
    All your actions generate noise and attract attention.

  • Immersive AI
    AI's behavior is utterly unpredictable. Even I can't anticipate its next move.

  • Also for your attention

  • The presence of flickering light, be careful if you have problems with it.

Caution

This game is unique compared to many others that focus on the backrooms concept. It sets itself apart by not simply copying everything detailed within the community. Instead, it carefully integrates specific elements of the backrooms, providing a distinct perspective rather than mirroring the entire concept.

name: Backrooms: The Next Level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 TI / AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Backrooms: The Next Level is a Co-op horror game up to 4 players, where you and your friends will explore the game, try to pass the game level using your mind, wit, remembering the places where you were
